text:
Background
Annex II Acronyms and Glossary of Terms states the following:
‘PAY: the ordinary basic or minimum wage or salary and any other remuneration, whether in cash
or in kind, which the worker receives directly or indirectly (“complementary or variable
components”) in respect of his/her employment from his/her employer. “Pay level” means gross
annual pay and the corresponding gross hourly pay. “Median pay level” means the pay of the
